Title: Prohibits the sale of 7-hydroxymitragynine products
Summary: Prohibits the sale of products that contain 7-hydroxymitragynine at a level that exceeds 2% of total alkaloids or one milligram per serving; establishes fines for the sale of such products.
LawCode: Add ยง392-l, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of 7-hydroxymitragynine products
